Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-52531 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-52531 affecting package libsoup for versions less than 3.4.4-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libsoup is earlier than 3.4.4-2, affected by CVE-2024-52531
